text: Ana hanigeno Isipi vahera hankavezmia omanena, mago'azama hunaku'ma kema retro'ma hu'nesaza zana Nagra eri savri hanuge'za, ana zana osugahaze. Ana hanuge'za antahintahima erinakura, zamazanteti tro hu'nesnaza havi anumzante'ene, zamavune vahete'ene, fri vahe hankro'enema keagama nehaza vahete zamagra vugahaze.
